Tales Of Binary Deobfuscation - Part 2

May 16, 2020

On a previous article We discussed how we can approach some obfuscation techniques such as intstruction substitution, opaque predicates or range dividers. This article is dedicated to cover control flow flattening and how we can leverage symbolic execution to attempt to deobfuscate it. A practical examples deobfuscating some of the latest implemented control-flow flattening in Emotet will be shown.

Read more

A Brief Reference on Russia's Information Warfare

May 7, 2020

Information Warfare has evolved in the last years introducing challenges to reflect a theoretical model of this new domain in order to understand its nuances which impact a wide range of different sectors operating within the computer and information technology domain.
